commit message:
Merge branch 'release' of https://github.com/tanjot/logmein-android into tanjot-master

Conflicts:
src/in/shubhamchaudhary/logmein/ui/FragmentEdit.java

PROJECT MOVED TO GRADLE

* Project hereby moved to gradle
* All developers recommended to use Android Studio
Whitespace fix - changes tabs to 4 spaces

Modified 'Save' button name

Changed 'Save' button's name to 'Update'
in Edit fragment

Functional Update button in Edit Fragment

* Updates username and/or password on click
* Username is also updated in the spinner of
UserDatabase Activity
* Fragment still needs to be closed after updation
Renamed project to LogMeIn instead of logmein
